title: gbianchi
author: gbianchi
content: I made a 3d project of a display glass bell jar for my casascius coin.this is the 3d drawing:This is the glass bell used:and this is the result:

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: This looks amazing, mind sharing the 3D Files?

comments.author: PeakDK
comments.body: This looks amazing, Love it ‚ù§Ô∏è I would probably buy one if it went on sale ‚òùÔ∏èüòâ

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Nice! As a 3d printer myself I always love to see others printing for collectibles!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: That‚Äòs a coinholder design I haven‚Äòt seen before and it works quite well!Does it come with the cas coin? xDOn a serious note: any plans to release this for other (1 oz) coins, too?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: wow really awesome  it is a nice idea to enhance such a pieceI think several "options" can be printed also for other coins as suggested by @KryptowerkJust fit the "pocket" where the coin rests and it's over...However the idea/design it reminds to me "Uncle Scrooge" and his "Number one" (Zio Paperone e la Numero Uno)...I hope for @gbianchi this is the first piece of a long series and this is just a start

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Very well done....where would one find the glass cover from? What is the approximate cost of this display?¬† ¬†I have coins in mind that would sit nicely inside the glass dome.

comments.author: gbianchi
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on January 04, 2023, 11:04:41 PM ¬†Very well done....where would one find the glass cover from? What is the approximate cost of this display?¬†¬† I have coins in mind that would sit nicely inside the glass dome.I'm Italian and I ordered the glass cover from amazon.it:https://www.amazon.it/gp/product/B0946RNKDPI don't know if it is also found on amazon in other countries

comments.body: Quote from: gbianchi on January 04, 2023, 11:58:12 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on January 04, 2023, 11:04:41 PM ¬†Very well done....where would one find the glass cover from? What is the approximate cost of this display?¬†¬† I have coins in mind that would sit nicely inside the glass dome.I'm Italian and I ordered the glass cover from amazon.it:https://www.amazon.it/gp/product/B0946RNKDPI don't know if it is also found on amazon in other countries¬† Found plenty of other sizes here https://www.amazon.com/glass-dome-base/s?k=glass+dome+with+base ¬† And a 3.75 inch on etsy¬† https://www.etsy.com/listing/1088244163/new-glass-dome-display-cloche-375-x-5¬† Thanks!
